title.content-text: 7.1.4 - Data Link Layer - Connecting Upper Layer Services to the Media

brief.content-text: The diagram depicts connecting upper layer services to the media using a PC NIC. The O S I model shows the Data Link Layer highlighted. The Data Link Layer links the software and hardware layers. Physical devices devoted to the Data Link Layer have both hardware and software components. The NIC operates at Layers 1 and 2. Layer 1 and a portion of Layer 2 are implemented in hardware. A portion of Layer 2 and the remaining O S I upper layers are implemented in software.
